channel.title: Hydrascape - Over 200 Players in 3 months
channel.description:
[center]Step into Hydrascape...
[img]http://hydrascapehd.com/header.png[/img]
[img]http://hydrascapehd.com/imgs/skills.png[/img]
http://hydrascapehd.com/welcome.php
A fully completed 2011 Based Runescape Private server.
Go back to 2011 when Runescape was at its best, play in real 2011 HD Graphics instead of fake versions like our competitors.
Hydrascape is suitable for most types of players, we have put hours of effort into the game design to ensure all likes of players are able to find wealth doing there favourite activities. There are plenty of ways to make money for PVMer's, skillers and Pkers.
Not only do we have beautiful graphics and well balanced gameplay, our game engine is REVOLUTIONARY making the game run smoothly all the way throughout
All of our 25 skills are FULLY completed and work EXACTLY like they did in Runescape, we have spent countless hours tuning our combat system to ensure its PERFECT.
DDOS PROTECTED SERVERS
PERFECT HYBRIDDING
PERFECT PVP MOVEMENT
Hydrascape is the result of years of work and effort from our dedicated staff.
We also have the most realistic, perfected PVP system you will ever find ANYWHERE we have covered all the important aspects of PVP such as perfect timed switches, flawless Hybridding we've even covered the little things like not being able to fight diagonally.
So step in, join us, we gurantee you that you will find NO other server as realistic as Hydrascape.
[url=http://forum.hydrascape.net/]Click here for the forum[/url] [/center]
